articles.title: Lee Group Accused of Kowtowing to U.S.
articles.content:
Lee Group Accused of Kowtowing to U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Recently the Lee Myung Bak group was busy inviting former mercenaries of the U.S. and its allies who participated in the last Korean war and even their families to visit the "War Memorial Hall" and Panmunjom on the occasion of the June 25 Korean war and holding such farces as a "commemoration event" and "a party for them." It blustered that it would expand the scale of such events next year marking the 60th anniversary of the outbreak of the Korean war.
					 In another development, the puppet warmongers staged "the largest-ever exercises for carrying out the operational plan reminiscent of the June 25 war" under the simulated conditions of an actual war of aggression against the DPRK throughout Kangwon Province of south Korea with all units under the first army corps command of the puppet armed forces involved on June 24 and 25 allegedly to cope with a war.
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement on Thursday pointed out that this is aimed to cover up its despicable true colors as a provocateur of the Korean war, justify its anti-DPRK sanctions and war moves and kick up a "security" racket in south Korea in a bid to divert elsewhere the attention of the south Koreans critical of Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The June 25 war was a brigandish war of aggression provoked by the U.S. imperialists together with their stooges south Korean puppets in order to realize their scenario to turn the whole Korean Peninsula into a colony and, furthermore, put Asia under their military domination, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 This being a hard fact, the Lee group of traitors dared raise a hue and cry over "surprise attack" by someone, an insult to the history and truth, a mockery of justice and conscience and another intolerable provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The June 25 war taught a historic lesson that aggressors and provocateurs are bound to meet irrevocable destruction and miserable death. Those who are oblivious of it are destined to meet a miserable end. 
					
					 The Lee group of traitors will be made to keenly realize what a miserable end it will meet for its disgusting policy subservient to the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean people, and its dangerous policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen which only brings a holocaust of a nuclear war to this land.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Djibouti
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Djibouti
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Ismail Omar Guelleh, President of Djibouti, on the occasion of the 32nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message wished the President greater success in his work for prosperity of the country and well-being of the people.

articles.title: Inter-provincial Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Inter-provincial Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A national sports contest among provincial teams that opened on June 5, closed at the Hamhung Stadium on June 26.
					 The sports contest brought together at least 1,500 sportspersons selected from different provinces.
					
					 The contest produced ace players in various events and registered successes conductive to developing the nation's sports technique.
					
					 Players from South Hamgyong Province came first in the team standing while players from North Phyongan Province proved successful in women's basketball and men's table tennis and other events and those from North Hamgyong Province gave a good account themselves in men's football.
					
					 Jong In Chol, vice-chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, made a closing address.

articles.title: Soil-type Pollution-free Greenhouse Built
articles.content:
Soil-type Pollution-free Greenhouse Built
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- An ultra-modern greenhouse was built at Wonsan University of Agriculture, a reliable centre for training agricultural technicians in the DPRK.
					 It is a soil-type pollution-free greenhouse which fully meets modern scientific and technological requirements in every aspect.
					
					 The greenhouse having been furnished with a distributing board, an automatic control panel and various sensors, all its management and operation is being done automatically, including the control of light, temperature and humidity suitable to the growth of each crop.
					
					 The light shadings and ventilation windows on the walls and ceiling of the greenhouse are moving automatically in accordance with change of light, temperature and humidity on the day and in the night.
					
					 The greenhouse is also equipped with ultraviolet light lamps which automatically supplement insufficient light and kill bacteria in the air and drip irrigation with water tank and water purifier.
					
					 With the construction of the greenhouse, a new change can be effected in the education and scientific research of the university teaching staffs and students.

articles.title: Crop Growth Forecast in DPRK
articles.content:
Crop Growth Forecast in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The work of crop growth forecast is being conducted in a brisk way in the DPRK this year when all efforts are being concentrated on hitting the target of grain production.
					 The State Hydro-Meteorological Administration in charge of the first process of the forecast has deepened the research into boosting the accuracy rate of weather forecast.
					
					 Its research team collects and analyzes correctly the data on agro-meteorological phenomena in each period of ten-days and one month in close contact with the meteorological observatories in all parts of the country and, at the same time, renders monthly meteorological forecast to the relevant organs.
					
					 Its laborious data on present and future agro-meteorological phenomena constitute the precious basic information to do farming on the principle of the right crop in the right time in the agricultural field.
					
					 Entering this year the Academy of Agricultural Science is expanding the scope of crop growth forecast, covering fiber crops, oil-bearing crops and vegetables as well as grain crops and, at the same time, is pushing ahead with the growth forecast for pomiculture and poultry.
					
					 The academy is also exerting efforts to the prediction and forecast of main blight and harmful insects.
					
					 Scientists of the research institutes including the Crops Cultivation Institute and the Research Center for Agricultural Information Technology and all the provincial branch academies of agricultural science are taking thorough agro-technological measures according to the weather conditions and the agro-meteorological conditions to be foreseen.
					
					 The State Hydro-Meteorological Administration and the Academy of Agricultural Science are conducting a concerted operation for establishing a well-arranged information system in order to forecast the crop growth rapidly and correctly in close contact with the agricultural sector.
					
					 The released forecasts are greatly helpful towards backing in a scientific and technological way the officials and working people of the agricultural field in their efforts to make this year shine with fruitful agricultural production.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Nuclear War Moves Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Nuclear War Moves Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea, when he met the U.S. president during his recent junket to the U.S., asked for specifying the U.S. "provision of nuclear umbrella" to south Korea in an official document allegedly to cope with "threat" from someone. At such request, it is stipulated in the document called "joint vision" that the U.S. shall provide the "extended deterrence" to south Korea in an event of "emergency."
					 This is a revelation of the wicked scheme to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost, says Rodong Sinmun in a signed article today.
					
					 All the successive pro-American dictators in south Korea eagerly toed the U.S. strategy for a nuclear war against the DPRK, but it is traitor Lee alone that acted a nuclear war servant, even imploring his master to officially stipulate the "provision of nuclear umbrella," the article notes, and goes on to say:
					
					 In case the south Korean puppets keen on invasion of the DPRK have access to nukes, the DPRK will surely be a target of them.
					
					 They are now loudly advertising about "provocation" and "threat" from the DPRK, but such smear campaign can never cover up the wicked intention of the U.S. seeking to provoke a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and the puppets zealously following it.
					
					 The puppet warmongers are rashly driving the nuclear war chariot of the aggressors with their help, swimming against the trend of the times toward the independent reunification, peace and prosperity. Such frantic moves should never be allowed but decisively checked.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent based on justice and patriotism will help smash any mad nuclear war provocation moves of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers and reliably protect the peace and security of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors should not make rash act, clearly mindful that the said stipulation and the nuclear armament are as good as a self-destruction.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Hysteric Moves to Stifle Compatriots Lambasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Hysteric Moves to Stifle Compatriots Lambasted
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, when interviewed by Wall Street Journal recently, uttered that he fully supports the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 Meanwhile, the group of traitors is showing exceptional zeal in implementing the above-said "resolution" as evidenced by its creation of "an all-government consultative body," etc.
					
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lee's reiteration of "full support" to the resolution once again clearly reveals his ulterior intention to implement the "resolution" as early as possible, subservient to foreign forces.
					
					 The above-said action taken by the Lee group brings to light its sinister scenario to start a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The Lee group's loud-mouthed "sanctions" against the DPRK would get it nowhere.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have already declared solemnly that they would resolutely counter "sanctions" with retaliation and "confrontation" with all-out confrontation.
					
					 The desperate efforts made by the Lee group to implement the "sanctions" against the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces would only precipitate its self-destruction. 
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to behave itself, bearing in mind he who digs a pit for others falls into it.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japan's New "Law" Aimed at Overseas Expansion
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japan's New "Law" Aimed at Overseas Expansion
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Japanese House of Representatives revoted a "bill on combating piracy" and adopted it on June 19.
					 The "law" extends the operational theatre of the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF) to the open sea from the original scope of territorial waters of Japan and its neighboring waters, thus making it possible for it to carry out military operations in any sea. The "law" also invested the SDF with the "policing" for keeping "public security" abroad under the pretext of checking all piracies. 
					
					 This has brought to light Japan's ambition to conduct active military operations in major international sea routes under the pretext of "combating piracy" and "ensuring security along the sea routes" and thus launch reinvasion.
					
					 It is a strategic goal and an indispensable requirement of the Japanese reactionaries to have the SDF's overseas advance justified for reinvasion.
					
					 To this end, Japan modified the existing Constitution which bans the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" and overseas military operations, and has since persistently pushed ahead with the moves to lay an institutional and legal groundwork necessary for the overseas dispatch of the SDF.
					
					 Various laws were instituted and put into force to justify the SDF's "advance" into continents and oceans.
					
					 To cite a few examples, Japan adopted "law on cooperation in UN peace-keeping operations", "law on emergency in surrounding areas", "law on special measures against terrorism" and "law on emergency", etc. and "dispatched" the SDF to several countries.
					
					 The "law on combating piracy" is an extension of such moves which more glaringly revealed the Japanese reactionaries' ambition for aggression and militarism.
					
					 The SDF seeks to participate in military operations for "protecting" ships of other countries including the U.S. in the open sea any time and tighten Japan's military nexus with the U.S.
					
					 Japan also seeks a sinister intention to realize military domination over the major international sea routes and perpetrate high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 It is contemplating keeping the SDF in the waters off Somalia for an indefinite period and putting the economic arteries of those countries conducting trade through this sea route under its control.
					
					 This proves that Japan is set to repeat its acts of aggression dating back to the Second World War when it resorted to high-handed and arbitrary practices in the Strait of Malacca after massively hurling warships there and sparking off armed conflicts and looting people's properties under the pretext of "wiping out pirates".
					
					 The above-said "law" allows firing at hulls of ships under the pretext of "stopping them," a very intolerable criminal act.
					
					 No one can predict what the Japanese militarists seized by overseas expansion and reinvasion would do in operational waters now that the use of weapons is allowed. They may launch armed attack on ships of other countries or conduct military actions against the neighboring countries under the pretext of "combating piracy."
					
					 The DPRK can never remain an on-looker to the development as the law was enacted at a time when Japan is kicking up anti-DPRK racket, trumpeting about "adjustment of law" and unilateral "sanctions" for the implementation of the UNSC "resolution". 
					
					 The DPRK has already warned that it would counter any attempted check, inspection and blockade against ships or any other objects to which the sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised with powerful military counterattacks.
					
					 In case Japan attempts to check and inspect DPRK-flagged ships and other objects on the strength of the above-said law the DPRK will mercilessly retaliate against it.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Intelligence Service on June 17 issued a summons to Permanent Representative Ri Jong I and Co-Representative Kim Yong Jin and two other members of the Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to appear before it. 
					 The puppets are cracking down on them on charge of the violation of the "National Security Law", taking issue with the congratulatory messages from the North Side Committee and the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration read out at the function marking the 9th anniversary of the said joint declaration held in Pusan on June 15 under the sponsorship of the above-mentioned south side committee. The group of traitors threatened to take a legal action against them in case they refuse to appear. 
					
					 In this connection 13 regional headquarters of the south side committee on June 22 issued a press release strongly denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group's suppression.
					
					 The above-said congratulatory messages were handed to the Pusan Headquarters after going through legitimate procedures through the south side committee, the organizations noted, asserting that, accordingly, the "Intelligence Service" has no ground to interfere in this and moreover, there is no justification to apply the NSL to the matter. 
					
					 The organizations said that congratulatory messages from the north were read out at the reunification functions held every year since the publication of the joint declaration but they have never become a target of suppression.
					
					 They demanded the Lee Myung Bak regime stop the moves to expand and reinforce the "Intelligence Service" and abolish the NSL.

articles.title: Declaration on Situation Issued by S. Korean Religionists
articles.content:
Declaration on Situation Issued by S. Korean Religionists
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- 251 Round Buddhists of south Korea released a declaration on the situation on June 22 in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' unpopular, anti-reunification and undemocratic rule.
					 The declaration said they could not but deplore over the sad reality of the corrupt society as evidenced by the tragic death of Ryongsan evacuees, the death of the former "president," etc.
					
					 It urged the Lee "government" to guarantee the freedom of speech, expression, assembly, association and workers' basic rights, halt the "construction of a big canal" and  the attempt to make a retrogressive revision of the law on media and pursue a policy for the people, not restoring dictatorship and violating democracy.
					
					 The declaration urged the group to defuse the tension and confrontation between the south and the north as early as possible and clarify its will to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a landmark of reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Sycophantic and Treacherous Act Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Sycophantic and Treacherous Act Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a statement on June 23 condemning Lee Myung Bak for fully revealing his attempt to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost by peddling what he called "extended deterrence" with his U.S master during his junket to the U.S.
					 The statement accused Lee of conducting such a disgraceful act as begging the U.S. to help solve even an internal issue of the nation during his tour.
					
					 The efforts to achieve peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula and prosperity common to the nation in the idea of "By our nation itself" went bust overnight due to the Lee Myung Bak regime's hostile acts against the DPRK, the statement noted, stressing:
					
					 A peaceful future of the Korean nation can hardly expected as long as Lee Myung Bak, sycophant, traitor and war maniac, is allowed to stay in power.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies by Personages of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Embassies by Personages of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The vice-director of the International Department of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea who is the representative of the party paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy in Equatorial Guinea on June 19 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The representative recalled that Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into an invincible party, working at the C.C., WPK, for the past 45 years, and performed undying exploits by wisely leading the struggle for the prosperity and reunification of the country.
					
					 The resolute measures taken by the DPRK including its recent second nuclear test clearly prove the pluck of the DPRK with which it does what it should do no matter what others may say, he said, adding:
					
					 The party and the people of Equatorial Guinea will make every effort to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK and the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Repeal of UNSC's "Resolution" on DPRK Urged
articles.content:
Repeal of UNSC's "Resolution" on DPRK Urged
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of different countries released statements in protest against the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said in its June 15 statement that the just measure taken by the DPRK serves as a practical example as it showed the international community how small countries should cope with the tyranny of big countries infringing upon their sovereignty.
					
					 Saying that the very one to be duly punished is the U.S. engaging itself in violation of human rights in different parts of the world, it demanded that the UNSC's "resolution 1874" be retracted.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party in its statement on June 20 strongly rejected the "resolution" adopted under the U.S. imperialists' pressure and expressed full support for the DPRK's stand.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee in a statement on June 13 said that it fully supports all the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK. And it urged the UNSC not to take any war action against it.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for National Sovereignty Supported in Pakistan
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for National Sovereignty Supported in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Punjab Provincial Committee of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan, the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, the Peasants Committee and the Trade Union Federation of Pakistan, the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification issued a joint statement on June 18 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The statement said that the second nuclear test conducted by the DPRK can not be a threat to the global peace as it was only the self-defensive measure to cope with the ever-more increasing nuclear threat from the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 This measure taken by the DPRK is the legitimate right which is not contrary to any international law, it said, expressing solidarity with the Korean people in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 It urged the UNSC to discard high-handed and arbitrary practices and retract the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. 
					
					 It called upon the world peace-loving people to express firm solidarity with the Korean people in the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, too, issued a statement on the same day on the occasions of the 9th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S joint struggle.
					
					 The statement expressed strong opposition to the "resolution" on sanctions against the DPRK and its implementation and urged the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK at once and opt for dialogue with the latter.
					
					 It declared that the association would activate the solidarity movement supporting the Korean people in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and peace of the Korean Peninsula during the month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Celebrated
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Nepal and Bangladesh on June 14 and 18 to mark the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said that Kim Jong Il has further developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and thoroughly applied it in all fields while pursuing the Songun politics, the peculiar mode of politics in the present era.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a political and ideological and military power which nobody dare provoke and firmly defended all its precious things in the acute political and military confrontation with the United States. The credit for this goes to Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 We extend support to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people courageously countering the unjust pressure and sanctions by the U.S.
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, and other speakers noted that Kim Jong Il has strengthened the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung guided by his revolutionary idea and a revolutionary party which achieved the unbreakable unity and cohesion and has firm mass foundation and turned with his unique Songun leadership the DPRK into a powerful country no any formidable enemy dare pounce upon. 
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was brought out in booklet by the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico on June 19. 
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that priority should be given to ideological work over anything else to successfully accomplish socialism, the basic task of ideological work is to color the whole society with socialist ideology and ideological work must be carried out in accordance with principles and methods which meet the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Sycophancy towards U.S. and Treachery Condemned by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Sycophancy towards U.S. and Treachery Condemned by Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan was held in Tokyo on June 24 to denounce Lee Myung Bak for his sycophancy towards the U.S. and treachery and to support the south Korean people in their struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.
					Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, in a report assailed traitor Lee for having totally negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, bedeviled the inter-Korean relations and pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war in league with foreign forces while enforcing tyrannical rule and reducing south Korea to a dark land under fascist dictatorship. 
					
					 He expressed support to the anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle of the south Korean people gaining in scope and strength throughout south Korea with each passing day. He declared all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans would turn out in the dynamic movement for national reunification in order to frustrate the anti-reunification moves of traitor Lee and defend and implement the above-said declarations without fail.
					
					 Then Jun Shimizu, representative member of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and Tomatsu Katsunori, member of the Secretariat of National Network of the Japan-south Korea People's Solidarity, made speeches expressing solidarity with the struggle of the south Korean people.
					
					Ri Myong Yu, vice-chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, Rim Kyong Suk, chairperson of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, and Choe Song Yong, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, made speeches denouncing traitor Lee. 
					
					 Prior to the meeting, the attendants watched a video "Mounting Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle of South Korean People."
					
					 They put their signatures on the Korean Peninsula Flag, reflecting their will to thoroughly implement the above-said declarations.

articles.title: CRPP repudia celebraciones del 25 de junio en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP repudia celebraciones del 25 de junio en el Sur de Corea
  Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- En los ultimos dias, en ocasion del 25 de junio, la banda de Lee Myung Bak invito al Sur de Corea a los ex - mercenarios de Estados Unidos y de otros paises satelites, quienes habian participado en la pasada guerra coreana, y sus familiares y organiza para ellos una serie de actividades como la visita a la "casa memorial de la guerra" y al Phanmunjom, el "acto conmemorativo" y el "banquete de consuelo".
					  Y procura ampliar la dimension de esas celebraciones en el ano proximo en que se cumpliran los 60 anos del estallido de la guerra coreana.
					
					  Por otra parte, bajo el pretexto de enfrentarse a la guerra, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos desarrollaron los dias 24 y 25 el "ejercicio por la ejecucion del plan operacional en memoria del 25 de junio" de mayor envergadura, que supone la guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, a lo largo de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea movilizando a todas las unidades pertenecientes a la comandancia del cuerpo No.1 de las fuerzas terrestres surcoreanas.
					
					  Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 25 la declaracion.
					
					  Esos movimientos parten del objetivo de la camarilla de Lee de enmascarar su sucia fachada de provocador de la guerra coreana y dar razon a su campana de sancion anti-RPDC y maniobras belicas contra esta, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Ademas, persigue el otro fin de distraer la atencion de los habitantes surcoreanos, que esta enfocada a la lucha anti-Lee Myung Bak, haciendoles creer que la "seguridad" surcoreana corre el peligro.
					
					  La pasada guerra desatada el 25 de junio de 1950 fue la contienda gangsteril y agresiva provocada por EE.UU. y sus titeres surcoreanos con la ambicion de colonizar toda la Peninsula Coreana y, a la larga, implantar el dominio militar sobre toda Asia.
					
					  Pero, la banda del traidor Lee habla tanto del supuesto "asalto" de alguien, lo cual deviene insulto a la historia y la verdad, burla a la justicia y la conciencia y otro imperdonable acto provocativo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Esta claro el destino que correran los que olvidaron las lecciones historicas del 25 de junio de que los agresores y los provocadores estan condenados a la irremediable derrota y a la muerte tragica.
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee sentira en carne propia cuan tragico sera el desenlace de su repugnante servilismo a EE.UU., enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana, y sus empecinadas maniobras de enfrentamiento fratricida, que estan trayendo los desastres de guerra nuclear al territorio patrio.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a Lee Myung Bak que busca la guerra nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a Lee Myung Bak que busca la guerra nuclear
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- Durante su reciente visita a Estados Unidos, el traidor Lee Myung Bak se reunio con el presidente norteamericano y le suplico que documentara oficialmente el "ofrecimiento del paraguas nuclear" al Sur de Corea hablando de la supuesta "amenaza" de alguien. 
					Segun esta peticion, quedo incluido oficialmente en el documento llamado "Vision comun" el parrafo sobre la entrega del "disuasivo ampliado" de EE.UU. al Sur de Corea en el "tiempo de emergencia".
					
					  En un comentario individual publicado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que esa documentacion parte del siniestro intento de desatar a toda costa la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, y prosigue:
					
					  Todos los sucesivos dictadores proyanquis del Sur de Corea habian apoyado activamente la estrategia de EE.UU. de la guerra nuclear contra el Norte de Corea.
					
					Pero, ninguno ha ido tan lejos como ese sirviente encargado de ejecutar la guerra nuclear (Lee Myung Bak) que suplico a su amo gringo hasta la documentacion oficial del "ofrecimiento del paraguas nuclear".
					
					  Si las armas nucleares paran en manos de los titeres surcoreanos deseosos de agredir a la RPDC, esta sera sin dudas su blanco.
					
					  Aunque los titeres surcoreanos acusan porfiadamente a la RPDC de la "provocacion" y "amenaza", nunca podran ocultar la aborrecible fachada de EE.UU., que suena con lanzar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, y de si mismos que colaboran activamente con el imperio para el mismo fin.
					
					  Hay que frenar las imperdonables maniobras de los belicistas titeres, que arrean locamente el carro de guerra nuclear de su amo agresor desafiando a la corriente de la epoca a la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					  El justo y patriotico disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC garantizara la paz del pais y la seguridad nacional frustrando cualesquier maniobras de esa indole de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos.
					
					  La banda traidora de Lee debe portarse con razon teniendo presente que la documentacion del "paraguas nuclear" y el armamentismo nuclear le resultarian otra accion suicida.

articles.title: ATCC comenta movimientos de Japon para legalizar expansion a ultramar
articles.content:
ATCC comenta movimientos de Japon para legalizar expansion a ultramar
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- El dia 19, fue aprobado en la camara de representantes de la dieta japonesa el "proyecto de ley anti-pirateria" sometido de nuevo a la votacion.
					Este "proyecto" permitio a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon cumplir la operacion militar en cualquier zona maritima al ampliar su teatro operacional de los mares territoriales y los cercanos a su pais a la alta mar.
					
					Tambien, bajo el pretexto de controlar la pirateria en general, se concedio a esas fuerzas el "derecho policial" para el "mantenimiento de la seguridad" en ultramar.
					
					De esta manera, Japon expuso directamente su ambicion de desarrollar activas operaciones militares en las importantes rutas maritimas internacionales bajo el vistoso rotulo de la "prevencion de pirateria" y la "aseguracion de las rutas maritimas" y emprender el camino de nueva agresion a ultramar.
					
					La legalizacion de la salida a ultramar de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" deviene el objetivo estrategico y asunto indispensable para los reaccionarios japoneses que persiguen nueva agresion.
					
					Para este fin, ellos han venido impulsando con teson las maniobras para enmendar la constitucion vigente, que prohibe el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" de Japon y su operacion militar en ultramar, y sentar las bases institucionales y juridicas necesarias al envio de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a otros paises.
					
					Instituyeron y pusieron en vigor unas leyes para dar legitimidad al "avance" a los continentes y oceanos de esas tropas.
					
					Efectivamente, fueron despachados a varios paises los efectivos de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en virtud de la "ley de cooperacion con las actividades de la ONU para el mantenimiento de la paz", la "ley para las contingencias del contorno", la "ley de medidas especiales frente al terrorismo", la "ley para el tiempo de emergencia", etc.
					
					El recien aprobado "proyecto de ley anti-pirateria" es la continuacion de esas legislaciones y la muestra de la creciente ambicion agresiva y militarista de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Ellos tratan de fortalecer la connivencia militar con EE.UU. al lanzar en cualquier momento a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a las operaciones militares en alta mar para "proteger" los barcos de EE.UU. y otros paises.
					
					Tambien, persiguen otro objetivo de actuar con arbitrariedad y despotismo en las principales rutas maritimas internacionales mediante el establecimiento del dominio militar sobre ellas.
					
					El mar frente a Somalia, teatro operacional de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", es la estrategica via maritima por donde pasan las embarcaciones de muchos paises del mundo.
					
					A traves de la presencia a largo plazo de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en el mar frente a Somalia, Japon quiere controlar las arterias economicas de los paises que no pueden prescindir de esa ruta maritima para el comercio.
					
					Asi que Japon trata de repetir los actos agresivos, inclusive los conflictos armados y el saqueo, en que incurrian sus numerosos buques de guerra enviados durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial al Estrecho de Malaca bajo el pretexto del "exterminio de piratas".
					
					Sobre todo, es un crimen nunca perdonable el hecho de que los reaccionarios japoneses dieron en el mencionado "proyecto de ley" el permiso al fuego contra las naves para pararlas.
					
					Nadie puede prever lo que harian abusando de esa medida los militaristas japoneses, entusiasmados por la expansion a ultramar y la nueva agresion, en sus zonas operacionales.
					
					Quizas cometan el ataque armado contra los buques de combate de otros paises o inicien las acciones militares contra los paises perifericos.
					
					El "proyecto de ley anti-pirateria" es insoslayable especialmente para la RPDC porque su aprobacion coincide con que Japon lanza una acalorada campana contra ella hablando del "arreglo de la ley" para la ejecucion de la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y la "sancion" independiente.
					
					La RPDC ya advirtio que frustraria cualquier intento de controlar, inspeccionar, chequear y bloquear cualquier barco u objeto bajo su jurisdiccion con el poderoso e implacable golpe armado de represalia.
					
					Esta advertencia es valida sobre todo para Japon.

articles.title: Labor de prevision de condiciones vegetativas de plantas agricolas
articles.content:
Labor de prevision de condiciones vegetativas de plantas agricolas
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ATCC) -- En Corea se desarrolla animadamente la labor de informacion previa de las condiciones vegetativas de las plantas agricolas para alcanzar la meta de produccion cerealista de este ano.
					La Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica se hace cargo de esta labor y profundiza la investigacion para asegurar la exactitud del pronostico del tiempo.
					
					Este colectivo de investigacion, en estrecha cooperacion de los observatorios locales, controla y analiza exactamente por periodo de diez dias y mes los datos meteorologicos agricolas y preve con un mes de antelacion el fenomeno atmosferico para ponerlo en conocimiento de los organos correspondientes.
					
					Los datos detallados de meteorologia agricola actual y futura constituyen valiosas informaciones basicas para labrar la tierra en el principio del cultivo adecuado en tiempo apropiado.
					
					Este ano, la Academia de Ciencia Agricola extiende la esfera de pronostico vegetativo de las plantas agricolas a las plantas fibrosas y oleaginosas y de verduras y a las ramas de fruticultura y avicultura.
					
					Encauza la fuerza tambien a la labor de observacion e informacion previas de las enfermedades e insectos nocivos.
					
					Los investigadores del Instituto de Cultivos de Plantas Agricolas, el Centro de Tecnologia Informatica de Agricultura y otros institutos y filiales provinciales de la Academia de Ciencia Agricola toman estrictas medidas tecnicas convenientes a las condiciones meteorologicas y las condiciones vegetativas de plantas agricolas que se preven.
					
					La Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologia y la Academia de Ciencia de Agricultura, en la estrecha cooperacion con la rama agricola, libran con esmero la operacion conjunta para establecer mas ordenadamente el sistema de informacion para este fin.
					
					Las informaciones previas dadas a conocer hacen gran aporte cientifico y tecnico a los esfuerzos de los trabajadores agricolas por aumentar la produccion cerealista de este ano.
